title: Kate Beckinsale, 46, displays her enviably taut midriff and appendectomy scar in tiny black bra
text:
She is the age-defying actress who is known for her incredible figure.

And Kate Beckinsale looked incredible as she posed up in a bra and a tiara in a sizzling Instagram snap on Monday.

The Pearl Harbour actress, 46, flaunted her enviably taut midriff and tiny waist in a scanty black lace bra- as she lauded a scar on her abdomen from her appendectomy.

Wow: Kate Beckinsale looked incredible as she posed up in a bra and a tiara in a sizzling Instagram snap on Monday

The brunette beauty paired the racy look with a sparkling tiara, with her tresses held back from her face with the bejewelled headwear.

The make-up free beauty teamed this with black skinny jeans and a white leather belt for the sultry selfie taken in a mirror.

In a hilarious caption, she wrote: 'If you have a visible appendix scar you’re allowed to wear a tiara for no reason. Don’t marry into royalty : whip out an organ. Far less bother.'

The Chiswick-born bombshell shares a 20-year-old daughter called Lily with her ex Michael Sheen, who just became a father again at 50.

Banter: In a hilarious caption, she wrote: 'If you have a visible appendix scar you’re allowed to wear a tiara for no reason. Don’t marry into royalty : whip out an organ. Far less bother'

Michael and his girlfriend Anna welcomed a daughter called Lyra on September 23.

'On behalf of Anna and myself thanks to everyone for your lovely messages of congratulations,' he wrote graciously.

The Welsh hunk added: 'It’s been a wonderful, bleary-eyed week full of love and kindness and extraordinary poo. #NotReferringToMyself'.

Kate hit the headlines earlier this year for her now-ended romance with 25-year-old Saturday Night Live funnyman Pete Davidson.

Former flames: The Chiswick-born bombshell shares a 20-year-old daughter called Lily with her ex Michael Sheen, who just became a father again at 50 (above with his ex Sarah Silverman in 2016)

Pete was hot on the heels of his high-profile broken engagement to pop star Ariana Grande, who recently released the smash hit breakup album Thank U, Next.

Kate and Pete's relationship went public when they were spotted kissing in the stands at a hockey game in New York City on March 2.

The big revelation occurred one day after the first season of Kate's new drama show The Widow dropped on Amazon Prime.
